pages.text: A $(thing)Thermopneumatic Processing Plant/$ uses $(l:base_concepts/pressure)pressure/$ and/or $(l:base_concepts/heat)heat/$ to process materials. It has several uses:$(li)100mB $(thing)LPG/$ and 1 piece of $(item)Coal/$ makes 1000mB of $(l:components/plastic)Plastic/$. This requires heat, but no pressure.$(li)1000mB of $(thing)Diesel/$ and 1 piece of $(item)Redstone Dust/$ makes 1000mB of $(l:components/lubricant)Lubricant/$. Again, this requires heat, but no pressure.
$(li)$(item)熱氣動加工機/$可以用於將$(l:manufacturing/refinery)精煉廠/$產出的重油裂化為輕油，每級轉化率為 80%：$(li)柴油 -> 煤油$(li)煤油 -> 汽油$(li)汽油 -> 液化石油氣$(p)該合成既需要熱量又需要壓力。
